metadata.dc:author: Candáu, R
Barrera Santa Ana, M
Navarro González, J
Nieto Barrera, M
Rufo Campos, M
metadata.dc:description: A four month old boy with typical clinical, biochemical and pathological picture of Reye's syndrome is reported. He was treated with peritoneal dialysis and survived. He presented flexor-spasms with hipsarrythmic E.E.G. one month after the beginning of the clinical picture. Some coments are made on the relation of both conditions and prognostic data on the Reve's syndrome.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de West, secundario a un síndrome de Reye
[West's syndrome after Reye's syndrome (author's transl)].
